zone.line: That you us today not despise,
And round this peoples throng
As one so goes,
So take from the handsomest jug
Which we with fresh drink have filled
I bring him to, & wish accordingly
That he not now the thirst you appease
The number of drops which he holds
Are your days to to lay .
Faust
I take the reviving drink
return
I thank you all health & thanks
The people collect themselves in a circle
round
Old Peasant.
Truly is it very well done
That you on the joyful day appear;
Have you it aforetime still with us
With
On evil days good common!
